bibl.title: Наркис како митолошка фигура во хеленската литература пред Овидиј. [Narcissus as a Mythological Figure in Greek Literature before Ovid.]
bibl.note: See in part.: 2. Parthenius and the recently found papyrus: P. Oxy. LXIX, 4711 (= M.-P.3 1757.01; LDAB 10579). - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Systasis. E-journal of the Association of Classical Philologists "Antika"

bibl.seg: Daniela Toseva Nikolovska, Наркис како митолошка фигура во хеленската литература пред Овидиј. [Narcissus as a Mythological Figure in Greek Literature before Ovid.]

See in part.: 2. Parthenius and the recently found papyrus: P. Oxy. LXIX, 4711 (= M.-P.3 1757.01; LDAB 10579). - Avec résumé en anglais.
